location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of the Qatar peninsula showing the concession boundary

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Photographic copy of a map of the Qatar peninsula attached to the Bahrain Express Letter No. C/49 dated 11th January 1942 (folios 2-3) to illustrate the question of the south eastern boundaries with Saudi Arabia.Shows the proposed concession boundary line with roads and distances reported; location of wells with fresh water marked.
